tasks.title: Database Schema & Migrations
tasks.description: Create D1 database schema with tables for users, financial_profiles, goals, scenarios, and conversations. Apply migrations locally and to remote.

tasks.title: OpenAPI Specification
tasks.description: Define complete OpenAPI 3.1 spec covering all API endpoints: auth, users, financial-profile, goals, models (monte-carlo, fixed-return, three-scenario, compare), scenarios, and AI chat.

tasks.title: Backend Middleware & Auth
tasks.description: Implement Cloudflare Pages Functions middleware for CORS, session validation, and error handling. Build auth endpoints (login, session validation) with UUID-based sessions.

tasks.title: User & Financial Profile API
tasks.description: Build CRUD endpoints for users and financial profiles. GET/PUT user by ID, POST/GET/PUT financial profile, disclaimer acknowledgment endpoint.

tasks.title: Goals API
tasks.description: Build CRUD endpoints for user financial goals. POST create, GET by user, PUT update, DELETE individual goals.

tasks.title: Monte Carlo Simulation Engine
tasks.description: Core feature: Implement Monte Carlo retirement simulation with 1000+ random scenarios. Box-Muller transform for normal distribution. Risk profiles (conservative/moderate/aggressive). Output percentile paths, success rate, retirement balances.

tasks.title: Fixed Return & Three-Scenario Models
tasks.description: Implement fixed return projection model and three-scenario (best/expected/worst) model. Model comparison endpoint.

tasks.title: AI Chat Endpoint
tasks.description: Build /api/ai/chat endpoint proxying to Anthropic Claude API. Financial advisor persona system prompt. Extract structured parameters from conversation. Track onboarding completion. Persist conversation history in D1.

tasks.title: Scenarios API
tasks.description: Build CRUD for saved simulation scenarios. POST save, GET by user, toggle active scenario.

tasks.title: Frontend Infrastructure & Routing
tasks.description: Set up React Router, Tailwind CSS theme, app shell with Layout component, auth guards, and API client utility matching OpenAPI spec.

tasks.title: Disclaimer System
tasks.description: Build DisclaimerModal (every login, must acknowledge) and DisclaimerBanner (persistent top banner). 'NOT financial advice' messaging. Cannot proceed without acknowledgment.

tasks.title: Landing Page & Auth Flow
tasks.description: Build landing page with RetireWise branding, email login, value propositions. Connect to auth API. Store session token in localStorage.

tasks.title: AI Onboarding Chat Interface
tasks.description: Build conversational chat UI for AI-guided onboarding. Chat bubbles, progress indicator, category checklist. Parameter extraction display. Confirm/edit extracted parameters before saving.

tasks.title: Dashboard - Metrics & Charts
tasks.description: PRIMARY VIEW: User info front and center. Metrics cards (portfolio, contribution, projected fund, success rate, readiness score). Monte Carlo fan chart with Chart.js. Goal line overlay.

tasks.title: Dashboard - What-If Controls
tasks.description: Scenario control sliders (retirement age, contribution, risk, Social Security). Real-time chart updates. Run Simulation button.

tasks.title: Model Selection & Comparison View
tasks.description: Model selector cards with previews. Side-by-side comparison with overlay chart. Visual explanation of each model type.

tasks.title: Profile & Financial Summary Views
tasks.description: User profile view/edit. Financial summary display/edit. Goal management UI.

tasks.title: Backend Unit Tests (90% coverage)
tasks.description: Unit tests for Monte Carlo engine, fixed return model, three-scenario model, utility functions. Vitest framework. 90% code coverage threshold.

tasks.title: Frontend Unit Tests (90% coverage)
tasks.description: Unit tests for formatters, hooks, component rendering. @testing-library/react + Vitest. 90% coverage threshold.

tasks.title: Playwright E2E Tests
tasks.description: End-to-end tests: landing page flow, disclaimer acknowledgment, onboarding chat, dashboard load, model comparison, what-if controls.

tasks.title: Merge Feature Branches & Deploy
tasks.description: Orchestrator merges feat/api and feat/ui into main. Resolve merge conflicts. Run full test suite. Push to main to trigger deployment pipeline.

tasks.title: Apply D1 Migration to Remote
tasks.description: Apply database migrations to the remote D1 instance for production use.

tasks.title: Post-Deploy Validation
tasks.description: Verify production deployment: homepage loads, API endpoints respond, disclaimer shows, onboarding flow works.
